title: Lost address book on new computer
content: New computer, transferred data from old computer at store. Hooked up comp at home. Email is all ok except no address book data! Help!
creator: donjolove

title: display
content: how to change from black text on white bkgd to reverse colors
creator: dthegold

title: columns too crowded
content:
When a message appears the sender's name is present in my column of emails. Of course. Fine.

But now, all of a sudden, I'm getting the sender's email address, too, which I do not want in my columns. How do I turn that feature back off?

This is driving me crazy so I'm eager for your help.
creator: marionf2
